COLDLOG_DIR.DESC: specify cold log directory. if it is not set, it will set to $LAONSILL_HOME/log.

HOTLOG_DIR.DESC: specify hot log directory. if it is not set, it will set to $LAONSILL_HOME/log.

SYSLOG_DIR.DESC: specify system log directory. if it is not set, it will set to $LAONSILL_HOME/log.

HOTLOG_BUFFERSIZE.DESC: specify buffer size of hot log. Note that total used memory is HOTLOG_BUFFERSIZE * thread count.

HOTLOG_SLOTSIZE.DESC: specify slot size of hot log. It should be least common divisor of HOTLOG_BUFFERSIZE and the greatest common divisor of 512

HOTLOG_FLUSH_SLOTCOUNT.DESC: specify flushing slot count of hot log.

HOTLOG_FLUSH_CYCLE_MSEC.DESC: A Hot Log Flusher flushes regularly. This parameter indicates its cycle time(ms).

SLEEP_WHEN_ASSERTED.DESC: This parameter determinces whether to sleep when a assertion occurs

JOBSCOPE_CLOCKTYPE.DESC: specify clocktype of job-scope SPERF module. 0: CLOCK_THREAD_CPUTIME_ID, 1: CLOCK_MONOTONIC, 2: CLOCK_MONOTONIC_COARSE

DQN_REPLAY_MEMORY_ELEM_COUNT.DESC: specify elem count of replay memory structure of deep Q network algorithm

BROKER_ADHOC_SESS_STARTS.DESC: specify start number of adhoc session of broker module

BROKER_ADHOC_SESS_COUNT.DESC: specify adhoc session count of broker module

IMAGEUTIL_SAVE_DIR.DESC: specify image util module's save directory.

CLUSTER_MODE.DESC: specify whether server supports cluster mode or not

PLAN_OPT_TEST_MAX_EPOCH_COUNT.DESC: specify max epoch count for plan optimizer test module.

PLAN_OPT_TEST_MAX_MINIBATCH_COUNT.DESC: specify max mini-batch count for plan optimizer test module.

PRINT_RUNLAYER_LOG.DESC: specify whether server prints log of the run layer function or not

PRINT_PARAMLOG_AFTER_NETWORKLOAD.DESC: specify whether server prints edge log after loading network or not

PRINT_PARAMLOG_AFTER_NETWORKSAVE.DESC: specify whether server prints edge log after saving network or not

PRODUCER_PERIODIC_CHECK_TIME_MS.DESC: it is the period of time the producer checks the job

TASK_CONSUMER_PERIODIC_CHECK_TIME_MS.DESC: it is the period of time the task consumer checks the job

JOB_CONSUMER_PERIODIC_CHECK_TIME_MS.DESC: it is the period of time the job consumer checks the job

SENDER_PERIODIC_CHECK_TIME_MS.DESC: it is the period of time the sender checks the job

RECEIVER_PERIODIC_CHECK_TIME_MS.DESC: it is the period of time the receiver checks the job

TASKPOOL_ALLOCTENSOR_ELEM_COUNT.DESC: specify element count of alloc tensor of the task pool

TASKPOOL_UPDATETENSOR_ELEM_COUNT.DESC: specify element count of update tensor of the task pool

TASKPOOL_RUNPLAN_ELEM_COUNT.DESC: specify element count of run plan of the task pool

TASKPOOL_ALLOCLAYER_ELEM_COUNT.DESC: specify element count of alloc layer of the task pool

PRINT_LAYERFUNC_LOG.DESC: specify whether server prints log of layer func module or not

COMMUNICATOR_REUSE_ADDR.DESC: specify whether server reuse address or not

COMMUNICATOR_LISTENER_PORT.DESC: specify listener port of LaonSill server

SPLITLAYER_START_LAYERID.DESC: specify start layer ID of split layer

USE_INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER.DESC: specify whether server uses data provider or not

INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER_ELEM_COUNT.DESC: specify elem count of input data provider

INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER_BLOCKING.DESC: specify whether to wait until data is available

INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER_CALLER_RETRY_TIME_US.DESC: specify retry time of caller for input data provider in microseconds

INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER_CALLER_WAIT_TIME_MS.DESC: specify wait time of caller for input data provider in miliseconds

INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER_WAIT_TIME_MS.DESC: specify wait time of input data provider in miliseconds

INPUT_DATA_PROVIDER_MEASURE_PERFORMANCE.DESC: specify whether to measure performance of input data provider module

STOP_TRAIN_WHEN_GOT_NAN_LOSS.DESC: specify whether to stop training when NaN loss value is happened or not

MEASURE_QUEUE_DEFAULT_SIZE.DESC: specify default queue size of measure entry module

USE_MEMORY_DUMP_WHEN_NETWORK_DESTROYED.DESC: specify whether to use memory dump when the network is destroyed

CUDA_MEMPAGE_SIZE.DESC: specify default memory page size of CUDA

UPDATER_RESET_GRADIENT.DESC: specify whether to reset gradient or not

DATAREADER_USE_PEEK_INSTEADOF_GET.DESC: specify whether to use peek func instead of get func in the data reader module

NETWORK_ADHOC_REFCOUNT_CHECKTIME_USEC.DESC: specify the time(micro sec) to check adhoc reference count at network shutdown

MEASURE_REFCOUNT_CHECKTIME_USEC.DESC: specify the time(micro sec) to check reference count of measure module at network shutdown
